package.name: tor-browser-de
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications install -m 0644 tor-browser_de.tar ${TGTDIR}/opt/ install -m 0644 tor-browser_en.tar ${TGTDIR}/opt/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/.config mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_en/.config mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/.config/empty_by_intention touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_en/.config/empty_by_intention touch ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser/empty_by_intention
######### Create starter for TOR browser
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser << FFRUN #!/bin/bash
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:\$PATH export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
cd /opt/tor-browser_\${lang}/Browser || cd /opt/tor-browser_en/Browser
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec ./start-tor-browser --detach
if [ -d /opt/tor-browser_\${lang} ] ; then sudo /opt/tor-browser_\${lang}/tor-browser_smack else sudo /opt/tor-browser_en/tor-browser_smack fi
FFRUN
######### Set some permissions
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/tor-browser
######### Create starter for TOR browser using smack
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/tor-browser_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/tor-browser_smack << FFSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
export PATH=\$PATH:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin
if [ -d /opt/tor-browser_\${lang} ] ; then cd /opt/tor-browser_\${lang} /static/sbin/newsmack torbrowser /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/tor-browser_\${lang}/Browser/start-tor-browser --detach" else cd /opt/tor-browser_en /static/sbin/newsmack torbrowser /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/tor-browser_en/Browser/start-tor-browser --detach" fi
FFSMACK
########## Create desktop file
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/torbrowser.desktop cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/torbrowser.desktop << DESKFILE
[Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=Tor Bowser Name[de]=Tor Browser Categories=Network; Exec=/usr/bin/tor-browser Icon=/opt/tor-browser/Browser/browser/chrome/icons/default/default48.png Terminal=false StartupNotify=true Path=
DESKFILE
########## Set some permissions
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/bin/tor-browser_smack chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de/start-tor-browser chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_en/start-tor-browser chown -R 1000:1000 ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_en chown -R 1000:1000 ${TGTDIR}/opt/tor-browser_de
